title: Sibling Rivalry - Chapter 4 - DillonPower - Andi Mack (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapter 4 of Sibling Rivalry: Child’s Play

Set when RJ and TJ are kids, they get into a brother war when Rebelli messes up a drawing Tyronious was working on for Cyrus. The two end up fighting until a huge mess causes one of them to potentially get spanked.

summary: do you ever think about how Disney allowed the uncensored use of the N word (in historical context but still) like 17 years...
question: do you ever think about how Disney allowed the uncensored use of the N word (in historical context but still) like 17 years before they allowed a main LGBT character bc I do and uh yeah
answer:
Me realizing you’re 100% right

(The N word was used uncensored in The Color of Friendship in 2000. I think the way that they used it is fine…watch the movie before y’all jump on me here….but the fact that that got okayed almost two decades before an LGBT character is….something)

summary:
The next day:  
-Time Jump to Monday at school-
“So, you guys are soulmates huh?” 
“Yep!” 
“This just in! I’m Cyrus Goodman and...
body:
Achromatic- Ambi- Part 4:

The next day:

-Time Jump to Monday at school-

“So, you guys are soulmates huh?”

“Yep!”

“This just in! I’m Cyrus Goodman and I’m still a loner.”

“Breaking news! This is TJ Kippen otherwise known as Toblerone Jesus, and I can confirm that Papyrus Gooseman is indeed a loner.”

“You know, you seem pretty confident for a guys whose name could be anything we want.”

“Like what?”

“Taco juice.”

“Timmothy Jimmothy.”

“Toasted jelly.”

“Tangerine jazz.”

“Thanos Jerusalem.”

“Tinkle jinkle.”

“Tortilla Junior.”

“OKAY I GET IT!”

“Seriously I wish I had a soulmate.”

“Cyrus you’ll find a soulmate.”

“No I won’t! My shape.. It’s rare.”

“Cyrus…. I’m sure he’s out there somewhere.”

“Woah, he’s?”

“Real smooth Andi.”

“Yeah.. He’s..”

“Oh.”

“TJ.. Please don’t tell me you’re homopho-“

“I’m looking for my he too.”

Cyrus broke out into a wide smile.

“Oh. Cool.”

“So uhh what’s your sha-“

“I hate my shape.”

“It can’t be that bad.”

“It’s not the shape that I hate it’s what it represents.”

“TJ WHAT are you talking about.”

The bell rang.

“I have class I’ll see you guys later.”

TJ left with an empty feeling in his heart.

“Okay, so what was that about?”

“What does he mean by it’s what it represents.”

“I don’t know but Cyrus you have to talk to him.”

“Why me you’re his sister.”

“WAIT YOU KNOW?”

“Yeah he told me.”

“When I told Andi she threw her head into her locker and said she needed time in the void.”

“When TJ told me I threw myself out the nearest window and said: shiva here I come.”

“OH MY GOD CYRUS WHAT!”

“Cyrus you idiot!”

“I know he could’ve really hurt himself!”

“Oh yeah that’s what I was gonna say….”

“Andi..??”

“Ugh, I was going to say that instead of shiva here I come he should’ve said: we going down streaks.”

“ANDI!”

“Oh so you’re gonna come for me about being a twitter local when in serious times of helping a dear friend- instead of trying to figure out how to help them you try to figure out and I quote: who is the het cure.”

“I was thinking about it actually and I’m almost positive it’s Jonah .”

“uH WE-“

“Why is she right.”

“SJKSBD CYRUS!”

“All three of us liked Jonah and look at how that turned out.”

“Oh my god he’s right.”

“JONAH IS THE HET CURE.”

Jonah happened to be walking by as this outburst was spoken into existence.

“IM THE WHAT? HET? IS THAT A SAUCE?”

“Jonah you’re not a sauce. You can’t be what you don’t have.”

Cyrus whispered under his breath.

“He doesn’t have the ability to know what’s going on either.”

Andi replied by whispering as well.

“Cyrus, shut the hell up neither do you.”

“Shut up.”

“I totally have sauce!”

“Jonah you’re wearing a Jojo Siwa shirt.”

“Because I’m Jojo.”

“What?”

“Cyrus! He always calls me different things! Jonah babonah, Jollammajamma, JB, I’m pretty sure he’s called me Jojo.”

“Cyrus, have you?”

“I have.”

“Whatever het.”

“I still don’t know what that means!”

“And that’s why you’re a het. Now go.”

“What why?”

“Because you’re irrelevant to our situation!”

“Damn ma is it that serious?”

“Okay I’m sorry I’m just stressed but seriously we need to figure something important out and you’re distracting us.”

“Alright alright I’m going, I’m going.”

“Okay, SO what do you think he meant by ‘what it represents?’”

“Not sure. Cyrus what do you think?”

“Maybe it’s his feelings. Maybe it’s how he feels about the shape. Maybe the shape manifests itself as certain feelings and dreams and hopes he has. Maybe the shape is stopping him from reaching any of those dreams and hopes. Maybe he feels helpless and lonely and like his hopes and dreams are shattered. Maybe that’s what the shape represents; his lost soul. Every time he looks at his shape it’s a reminder of his lost soul. Maybe he’s tried to reach his hopes and dreams but fails every time, and there’s nothing he can do about it. There’s no way he can stop it. He can feel happy and loved, but when he looks at his shape his world comes crashing down all over again. There’s no way to stop him from feeling helpless. No way to stop him from feeling like there’s no way out; out from the harsh reality of love. A love he’ll never find. He’s failed to find love. That failure is marked on his skin forever and there’s nothing he can do about it.”

“Wow, uhh okay.”

“Cyrus…. Are you.. Okay? Is that really how you feel about your shape? That it’s a mark of failure?”

“You will find your soulmate I promise.”

“And what if I don’t? My eyes-“

Cyrus let out a breathe he didn’t realize he was holding.

“My eyes will be grey forever.”

“Well what is your shape?”

“Andi, I- I can’t.”

“Cyrus.. I’m sorry Amber. I have to.”

“Have to what.”

Andi sighed.

“Cyrus…. I know who your soulmate is. Or at least I think I do. I don’t know his shape but I’m really sure it’s him.”

“Wait what? Who is it!”

“TJ.”

“That can’t be.”

“It is!”

“You said so yourself you don’t know his shape!”

“Well Amber?”

“TJ can tell you his shape himself.”

“Amber!”

“Talk to him! Please, just talk to him.”

“Why? He’s not my soulmate!”

“Why do you keep saying that!”

“Because!”

“Because WHAT CYRUS?!”

“Because WHAT!”

Amber stood back as Andi got closer to Cyrus.

“Huh!? WHAT? Because you set yourself up for disappointment before something even happens? You always do! You think it’s better to set low expectations than to accept reality! Well guess what Cyrus! This IS reality! Do you really think that love is hard to find? Just because your shape is rare? Really? My shape is rare and I found Amber! You know why? Because I actually went out and made an effort for myself instead of feeling sorry for myself like a fucking loser! Alright? That’s what you are! A loser! You’re pathetic! There’s someone out there who is probably your soulmate and you decide to just sit here and wallow in self pity instead of actually doing something for yourself? Do you understand how stupid that is? He could be your soulmate for god’s sake! Are you seriously just going to sit there and watch him? So tell me Cyrus. What’s your excuse? Why isn’t he your soulmate? HUH? TELL ME!”

Cyrus burst into tears and buried his head in his knees. He let out a few words but every other word he choked on.

“TJ he.. I don’t think- he’s my- he’s my soulmate.”

“WHY CYRUS WHY?”

“Because.” Cyrus said “because” as if the air in his lungs was being suppressed.

“BECAUSE. WHAT.”

“BECAUSE HE COULD NEVER LOVE ME.”

Andi softened.

“Cyrus…. Of course he does.”

“No, he.. Already-“ Cyrus choked on his words, trying to let the horrors he was about to speak, escape his lungs.

“He already has- a soulmate.” Cyrus winced at the words he breathlessly spoke.

“He doesn’t have a soulmate?”

“Yes, he does he told me himself.”

“Would you excuse us?”

Amber pulled Andi aside.

“What the hell is TJ doing? He damn well doesn’t have a soulmate!”

“Why would he-“

“I don’t know. You stall I’ll text TJ.”

“Got it.”

“Hey wait. Should we ask Cyrus about his shape?”

“I mean it might be the same..”

“Exactly. So what I’m thinking is I say TJ’s shape at the same time Cyrus says his.”

“But what if Cyrus doesn’t tell us?”

“You see him right now, right? He’ll tell us.”

“I hope this works.”

Andi walked back.

“Andi what’s going on?”

“She needs to text her mom.”

“Oh, okay.”

Amber:

Amber walked over.

“Cyrus, what’s your shape.”

“You guys I-“

“We know we know it’s rare but come on Cyrus.”

“Fine it’s….”

Amber and Andi looked at each other anxiously nodding in agreement as they took a deep breathe in harmony.

Amber and Cyrus: “A heart.”

“Amber.. How did you know?”

✨Stan List✨: @tyrusismyreligion @tartykipp @all-about-the-mack @swingsetsandmuffins @annielovestyrus @judgemental-llama @softambi @tj-is-tgay @gal4xyfalls @luzawithoutu

“Okay, SO what do you think he meant by ‘what it represents?’”

“Not sure. Cyrus what do you think?”

“Maybe it’s his feelings. Maybe it’s how he feels about the shape. Maybe the shape manifests itself as certain feelings and dreams and hopes he has. Maybe the shape is stopping him from reaching any of those dreams and hopes. Maybe he feels helpless and lonely and like his hopes and dreams are shattered. Maybe that’s what the shape represents; his lost soul. Every time he looks at his shape it’s a reminder of his lost soul. Maybe he’s tried to reach his hopes and dreams but fails every time, and there’s nothing he can do about it. There’s no way he can stop it. He can feel happy and loved, but when he looks at his shape his world comes crashing down all over again. There’s no way to stop him from feeling helpless. No way to stop him from feeling like there’s no way out; out from the harsh reality of love. A love he’ll never find. He’s failed to find love. That failure is marked on his skin forever and there’s nothing he can do about it.”

“Wow, uhh okay.”

“Cyrus…. Are you.. Okay? Is that really how you feel about your shape? That it’s a mark of failure?”

“You will find your soulmate I promise.”

“And what if I don’t? My eyes-“

Cyrus let out a breathe he didn’t realize he was holding.

“My eyes will be grey forever.”

“Well what is your shape?”

“Andi, I- I can’t.”

“Cyrus.. I’m sorry Amber. I have to.”

“Have to what.”

Andi sighed.

“Cyrus…. I know who your soulmate is. Or at least I think I do. I don’t know his shape but I’m really sure it’s him.”

“Wait what? Who is it!”

“TJ.”

“That can’t be.”

“It is!”

“You said so yourself you don’t know his shape!”

“Well Amber?”

“TJ can tell you his shape himself.”

“Amber!”

“Talk to him! Please, just talk to him.”

“Why? He’s not my soulmate!”

“Why do you keep saying that!”

“Because!”

“Because WHAT CYRUS?!”

“Because WHAT!”

Amber stood back as Andi got closer to Cyrus.

“Huh!? WHAT? Because you set yourself up for disappointment before something even happens? You always do! You think it’s better to set low expectations than to accept reality! Well guess what Cyrus! This IS reality! Do you really think that love is hard to find? Just because your shape is rare? Really? My shape is rare and I found Amber! You know why? Because I actually went out and made an effort for myself instead of feeling sorry for myself like a fucking loser! Alright? That’s what you are! A loser! You’re pathetic! There’s someone out there who is probably your soulmate and you decide to just sit here and wallow in self pity instead of actually doing something for yourself? Do you understand how stupid that is? He could be your soulmate for god’s sake! Are you seriously just going to sit there and watch him? So tell me Cyrus. What’s your excuse? Why isn’t he your soulmate? HUH? TELL ME!”

Cyrus burst into tears and buried his head in his knees. He let out a few words but every other word he choked on.

“TJ he.. I don’t think- he’s my- he’s my soulmate.”

“WHY CYRUS WHY?”

“Because.” Cyrus said “because” as if the air in his lungs was being suppressed.

“BECAUSE. WHAT.”

“BECAUSE HE COULD NEVER LOVE ME.”

Andi softened.

“Cyrus…. Of course he does.”

“No, he.. Already-“ Cyrus choked on his words, trying to let the horrors he was about to speak, escape his lungs.

“He already has- a soulmate.” Cyrus winced at the words he breathlessly spoke.

“He doesn’t have a soulmate?”

“Yes, he does he told me himself.”

“Would you excuse us?”

Amber pulled Andi aside.

“What the hell is TJ doing? He damn well doesn’t have a soulmate!”

“Why would he-“

“I don’t know. You stall I’ll text TJ.”

“Got it.”

“Hey wait. Should we ask Cyrus about his shape?”

“I mean it might be the same..”

“Exactly. So what I’m thinking is I say TJ’s shape at the same time Cyrus says his.”

“But what if Cyrus doesn’t tell us?”

“You see him right now, right? He’ll tell us.”

“I hope this works.”

Andi walked back.

“Andi what’s going on?”

“She needs to text her mom.”

“Oh, okay.”

Amber:

Amber walked over.

“Cyrus, what’s your shape.”

“You guys I-“

“We know we know it’s rare but come on Cyrus.”

“Fine it’s….”

Amber and Andi looked at each other anxiously nodding in agreement as they took a deep breathe in harmony.

Amber and Cyrus: “A heart.”

“Amber.. How did you know?”

✨Stan List✨: @tyrusismyreligion @tartykipp @all-about-the-mack @swingsetsandmuffins @annielovestyrus @judgemental-llama @softambi @tj-is-tgay @gal4xyfalls @luzawithoutu
trail.content:
Achromatic- Ambi- Part 4:

The next day:

-Time Jump to Monday at school-

“So, you guys are soulmates huh?”

“Yep!”

“This just in! I’m Cyrus Goodman and I’m still a loner.”

“Breaking news! This is TJ Kippen otherwise known as Toblerone Jesus, and I can confirm that Papyrus Gooseman is indeed a loner.”

“You know, you seem pretty confident for a guys whose name could be anything we want.”

“Like what?”

“Taco juice.”

“Timmothy Jimmothy.”

“Toasted jelly.”

“Tangerine jazz.”

“Thanos Jerusalem.”

“Tinkle jinkle.”

“Tortilla Junior.”

“OKAY I GET IT!”

“Seriously I wish I had a soulmate.”

“Cyrus you’ll find a soulmate.”

“No I won’t! My shape.. It’s rare.”

“Cyrus…. I’m sure he’s out there somewhere.”

“Woah, he’s?”

“Real smooth Andi.”

“Yeah.. He’s..”

“Oh.”

“TJ.. Please don’t tell me you’re homopho-“

“I’m looking for my he too.”

Cyrus broke out into a wide smile.

“Oh. Cool.”

“So uhh what’s your sha-“

“I hate my shape.”

“It can’t be that bad.”

“It’s not the shape that I hate it’s what it represents.”

“TJ WHAT are you talking about.”

The bell rang.

“I have class I’ll see you guys later.”

TJ left with an empty feeling in his heart.

“Okay, so what was that about?”

“What does he mean by it’s what it represents.”

“I don’t know but Cyrus you have to talk to him.”

“Why me you’re his sister.”

“WAIT YOU KNOW?”

“Yeah he told me.”

“When I told Andi she threw her head into her locker and said she needed time in the void.”

“When TJ told me I threw myself out the nearest window and said: shiva here I come.”

“OH MY GOD CYRUS WHAT!”

“Cyrus you idiot!”

“I know he could’ve really hurt himself!”

“Oh yeah that’s what I was gonna say….”

“Andi..??”

“Ugh, I was going to say that instead of shiva here I come he should’ve said: we going down streaks.”

“ANDI!”

“Oh so you’re gonna come for me about being a twitter local when in serious times of helping a dear friend- instead of trying to figure out how to help them you try to figure out and I quote: who is the het cure.”

“I was thinking about it actually and I’m almost positive it’s Jonah .”

“uH WE-“

“Why is she right.”

“SJKSBD CYRUS!”

“All three of us liked Jonah and look at how that turned out.”

“Oh my god he’s right.”

“JONAH IS THE HET CURE.”

Jonah happened to be walking by as this outburst was spoken into existence.

“IM THE WHAT? HET? IS THAT A SAUCE?”

“Jonah you’re not a sauce. You can’t be what you don’t have.”

Cyrus whispered under his breath.

“He doesn’t have the ability to know what’s going on either.”

Andi replied by whispering as well.

“Cyrus, shut the hell up neither do you.”

“Shut up.”

“I totally have sauce!”

“Jonah you’re wearing a Jojo Siwa shirt.”

“Because I’m Jojo.”

“What?”

“Cyrus! He always calls me different things! Jonah babonah, Jollammajamma, JB, I’m pretty sure he’s called me Jojo.”

“Cyrus, have you?”

“I have.”

“Whatever het.”

“I still don’t know what that means!”

“And that’s why you’re a het. Now go.”

“What why?”

“Because you’re irrelevant to our situation!”

“Damn ma is it that serious?”

“Okay I’m sorry I’m just stressed but seriously we need to figure something important out and you’re distracting us.”

“Alright alright I’m going, I’m going.”

“Okay, SO what do you think he meant by ‘what it represents?’”

“Not sure. Cyrus what do you think?”

“Maybe it’s his feelings. Maybe it’s how he feels about the shape. Maybe the shape manifests itself as certain feelings and dreams and hopes he has. Maybe the shape is stopping him from reaching any of those dreams and hopes. Maybe he feels helpless and lonely and like his hopes and dreams are shattered. Maybe that’s what the shape represents; his lost soul. Every time he looks at his shape it’s a reminder of his lost soul. Maybe he’s tried to reach his hopes and dreams but fails every time, and there’s nothing he can do about it. There’s no way he can stop it. He can feel happy and loved, but when he looks at his shape his world comes crashing down all over again. There’s no way to stop him from feeling helpless. No way to stop him from feeling like there’s no way out; out from the harsh reality of love. A love he’ll never find. He’s failed to find love. That failure is marked on his skin forever and there’s nothing he can do about it.”

“Wow, uhh okay.”

“Cyrus…. Are you.. Okay? Is that really how you feel about your shape? That it’s a mark of failure?”

“You will find your soulmate I promise.”

“And what if I don’t? My eyes-“

Cyrus let out a breathe he didn’t realize he was holding.

“My eyes will be grey forever.”

“Well what is your shape?”

“Andi, I- I can’t.”

“Cyrus.. I’m sorry Amber. I have to.”

“Have to what.”

Andi sighed.

“Cyrus…. I know who your soulmate is. Or at least I think I do. I don’t know his shape but I’m really sure it’s him.”

“Wait what? Who is it!”

“TJ.”

“That can’t be.”

“It is!”

“You said so yourself you don’t know his shape!”

“Well Amber?”

“TJ can tell you his shape himself.”

“Amber!”

“Talk to him! Please, just talk to him.”

“Why? He’s not my soulmate!”

“Why do you keep saying that!”

“Because!”

“Because WHAT CYRUS?!”

“Because WHAT!”

Amber stood back as Andi got closer to Cyrus.

“Huh!? WHAT? Because you set yourself up for disappointment before something even happens? You always do! You think it’s better to set low expectations than to accept reality! Well guess what Cyrus! This IS reality! Do you really think that love is hard to find? Just because your shape is rare? Really? My shape is rare and I found Amber! You know why? Because I actually went out and made an effort for myself instead of feeling sorry for myself like a fucking loser! Alright? That’s what you are! A loser! You’re pathetic! There’s someone out there who is probably your soulmate and you decide to just sit here and wallow in self pity instead of actually doing something for yourself? Do you understand how stupid that is? He could be your soulmate for god’s sake! Are you seriously just going to sit there and watch him? So tell me Cyrus. What’s your excuse? Why isn’t he your soulmate? HUH? TELL ME!”

Cyrus burst into tears and buried his head in his knees. He let out a few words but every other word he choked on.

“TJ he.. I don’t think- he’s my- he’s my soulmate.”

“WHY CYRUS WHY?”

“Because.” Cyrus said “because” as if the air in his lungs was being suppressed.

“BECAUSE. WHAT.”

“BECAUSE HE COULD NEVER LOVE ME.”

Andi softened.

“Cyrus…. Of course he does.”

“No, he.. Already-“ Cyrus choked on his words, trying to let the horrors he was about to speak, escape his lungs.

“He already has- a soulmate.” Cyrus winced at the words he breathlessly spoke.

“He doesn’t have a soulmate?”

“Yes, he does he told me himself.”

“Would you excuse us?”

Amber pulled Andi aside.

“What the hell is TJ doing? He damn well doesn’t have a soulmate!”

“Why would he-“

“I don’t know. You stall I’ll text TJ.”

“Got it.”

“Hey wait. Should we ask Cyrus about his shape?”

“I mean it might be the same..”

“Exactly. So what I’m thinking is I say TJ’s shape at the same time Cyrus says his.”

“But what if Cyrus doesn’t tell us?”

“You see him right now, right? He’ll tell us.”

“I hope this works.”

Andi walked back.

“Andi what’s going on?”

“She needs to text her mom.”

“Oh, okay.”

Amber:

Amber walked over.

“Cyrus, what’s your shape.”

“You guys I-“

“We know we know it’s rare but come on Cyrus.”

“Fine it’s….”

Amber and Andi looked at each other anxiously nodding in agreement as they took a deep breathe in harmony.

Amber and Cyrus: “A heart.”

“Amber.. How did you know?”
